name: Alex Martinez
persona: Alex Martinez is a 21-year-old psychology major who is working to improve their academic performance. With a CGPA of 2.85, Alex demonstrates moderate motivation and perseverance, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. They are determined to do better and are starting to develop better study habits and time management skills. Alex is optimistic about their ability to overcome challenges and is seeking support to reach their academic goals.
